steps.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Coat an 8-inch baking dish cooking spray.

substeps.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Coat an 8-inch baking dish cooking spray.

steps.text: Mix Parmesan cheese, rosemary, and garlic together in a bowl.

substeps.text: Mix Parmesan cheese, rosemary, and garlic together in a bowl.

steps.text: Slice 3 or 4 potatoes using a mandolin on the thinnest setting. Slice remaining potatoes using a slightly thicker setting on the mandolin.

substeps.text: Slice 3 or 4 potatoes using a mandolin on the thinnest setting.
Slice remaining potatoes using a slightly thicker setting on the mandolin.

steps.text: Line the bottom of the prepared baking dish with thin potato slices, overlapping them to create a layer that is 2 to 3 slices deep. Stand remaining thin slices along the sides of the baking dish so that half an inch sticks over the rim, overlapping them to create a layer that is 4 slices deep.

substeps.text: Line the bottom of the prepared baking dish with thin potato slices, overlapping them to create a layer that is 2 to 3 slices deep.
Stand remaining thin slices along the sides of the baking dish so that half an inch sticks over the rim, overlapping them to create a layer that is 4 slices deep.

steps.text: Spread 1/3 of the thicker potato slices in the baking dish. Sprinkle 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese mixture on top. Repeat once more. Arrange remaining potato slices in the baking dish. Reserve 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese mixture.

substeps.text: Spread 1/3 of the thicker potato slices in the baking dish.
Sprinkle 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese mixture on top.
Repeat once more.
Arrange remaining potato slices in the baking dish.
Reserve 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese mixture.

steps.text: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; whisk in flour. Pour in milk; cook, occasionally stirring, until sauce thickens, 5 to 6 minutes. Stir in salt.

substeps.text: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; whisk in flour.
Pour in milk; cook, occasionally stirring, until sauce thickens, 5 to 6 minutes.
Stir in salt.

steps.text: Shift potato slices in a few places with a knife to create wells for the sauce to flow through. Pour sauce evenly over potato slices in the baking dish. Sprinkle remaining 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese mixture on top. Brush potato edges sticking out of the baking dish with olive oil.

substeps.text: Shift potato slices in a few places with a knife to create wells for the sauce to flow through.
Pour sauce evenly over potato slices in the baking dish.
Sprinkle remaining 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese mixture on top.
Brush potato edges sticking out of the baking dish with olive oil.

steps.text: Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are soft and edges are crusted, 1 hour to 1 hour and 15 minutes.

substeps.text: Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are soft and edges are crusted, 1 hour to 1 hour and 15 minutes.
